reviews.review_msg: She was not helpful.
She is super hot and so smart! The best instructor I have ever had!

Interesting class for the most part. Prof uploads partial lecture notes on WebCT so you have to go to class to get the notes. Participation marks given for answering iClicker questions in class-- another reason to attend. Exams are a little tricky but not unmanageable if you know your stuff. Really nice prof and always willing to help!
Not interesting at all.
forgot to mention that have 101 & 104 with her in the same semester. Even better cos the content overlaps!
Funny! She is passionate in the field! Great teacher who makes class interesting and have clear structure and content. Never bored in her class. Extremely helpful! Strongly recommended!
Great teacher with humor, but is a tough marker.

She is a great prof in lectures! She is funny, interesting and you will never be bored in her course. She shows videos like Tupac's Resurrection, Scarface and The Godfather. However, she is a extremely hard marker on exams. Her study guide tell you exactly what to study but the way she marks is against how others in the class answers the questions.
Great prof! Fun to listen too and she has a good sense of humour in her lectures.  Whcih helps keep the interest. Going to miss this class!

Raegan was the TA for my class.  She was amazing! Extremely helpful and makes it easy to participate (even when it was SUPER early).  She always responded to emails so quickly which was awesome.  I would DEFINITELY take a class with her!! Better than most profs with PHD's! Take her class(es)!!!!

Friendly teacher, she gets sidetracked into her own life stories easily. For crim 105 the textbook was 150 bucks, unless you need and a+ dont buy it. about 98 percent of the tests come straight from lecture matterial
Raegan is great. She makes the subject interesting and she easily engages the class. Will definitely take another class with Raegan if possible; her study guide is the key to success!

Excellent prof. Very knowledgable and always available for help when needed. Gives you a review page of what will be on the exam one week before it, which makes her exams a lot easier. I would highly recommend her course to anybody
she's a very knowledgeable prof. fair marker. tried to get our tutorial engaged in discussion. will defiantly help you if you ask. recommended.
real good prof. but u have to go to class or youll be screwed. really chill and replys to emails super fast. if you study, u'll do well.

I agree! I took this class this semester and was far by the easiest crim classes ever taken! Break down of marks were 20%! She's great for any class!! More than fair and generous on marks! Approachable anytime for questions!! We should have more professors like Raegan Carmichael !! I totally recommend her and would take another class with her again

Great Professor!! Had her, no complaints!! Marks were more than generous!! She bumped up the midterm marks by 13% which brought me to an A-!! Who ever says she's not a good professor obviously were slackers who did not put in effort!! Put in the effort guys, and you will get the marks!! term paper, midterm, 20%!! Easy marker! I got an A- final mark

I don't know why this person think she's useless! I totally DISAGREE!! She is awesome and great!! Gives great insight!! Easy and fair marker!! This course is memorization yes, but it is not hard at all!! An easy GPA booster, if you put in the work!! Raegan is more than fair and understands students!!  She scaled up the midterm marks by 13%!!

Casual, approachable, and a great TA. However, she does not make a good professor. Class felt very first-year, as it was based on rote memorization of terms. Gave very vague requirements for the paper, and then revealed marks were based on a strict criteria not given to the students. Expect this to class to ruin your GPA. (Also it's very boring)

You can tell she has a genuine personal interest in the course content. The lectures were engaging and she provides some pretty good outlines to help with note-taking. The midterm and final were difficult but fair.  Required readings from the text were sometimes tedious.

Interesting prof, but mt and final are pretty hard. She likes to pick esoteric things and asks for definitions of them. Would be better if exams were MC, short answer, essay only. Go to class, her exams are note based less text based.
really hard marker on essay.
She's great! Easy marker of essays. I would definitely take her again.  Easy A. :)

Super helpful and supportive. Leads interesting discussions. Hard marker but provides great feadback to improve and this course was structured so that there were many assingments and opportunities to make up for bad marks. Great TA over all.

she's tough but very fair. is helpful when you need her help. if you follow the guidelines set out by the professor and do everything you're supposed to with a decent amount of effort. as long as you speak at least twice every class, you will get full participation marks. it's possible to participate w/o reading assigned readings.
She seems like she really wants to be there. Its like she actually likes doing this!(?) Hard things get easier and I appreciate her patience. Raegan is also way hot.

i had Raegan as my TA for crim104.  Overall, very nice person and helpful.  She will email you asap when you have a question and she will read your essay and make some suggestions as well.  She does mark hard on the essay but the participation she does mark easily.  Overall, good TA

she's good at stimulating conversation and discussion but she does not keep good track of partipation. keep a log of your own participation! i got shafted last semester! make sure your essays are structured and you use great grammar! presentations should have handouts and slides/powerpoint for a good mark.
